asset.title: Install aFe Scorcher Performance Module for BMW
asset.description:
Free shipping! http://www.autoanything.com/performance-chips/afe-scorcher-module

The aFe Scorcher Module's quick 20-minute installation is shown with step-by-step instructions on a BMW. After it's installed, your aFe Scorcher Module works with your engine to maximize torque and minimize turbo lag.

The aFe in-line module connects directly into your OEM wiring harness, making this a quick and easy performance chip install. The Scorcher Module is street legal in 49 states and is custom-designed to pair with your year, make and model. 

More products from aFe: http://www.autoanything.com/brands/102A419.aspx

See other in-line modules: http://www.autoanything.com/performance-chips/20A50072A1.aspx
asset.author: AutoAnything
